1 <?php
2 
3 namespace Ubiquity\themes;
4 
5 use Ubiquity\controllers\Startup;
6 use Ubiquity\views\engine\Twig;
7 use Ubiquity\exceptions\ThemesException;
8 use Ubiquity\events\EventsManager;
9 use Ubiquity\events\ViewEvents;
10 use Ubiquity\utils\base\UArray;
11 
22 class ThemesManager {
23  const THEMES_FOLDER = 'themes';
24  private static $activeTheme;
25  private static $refThemes = [ 'bootstrap','foundation','semantic' ];
26 
27  public static function getActiveTheme() {
28  return self::$activeTheme;
29  }
30 
37  public static function setActiveTheme($activeTheme) {
38  self::$activeTheme = $activeTheme ?? '';
39  $engineInstance = Startup::$templateEngine;
40  if ($engineInstance instanceof Twig) {
41  $engineInstance->setTheme ( $activeTheme, self::THEMES_FOLDER );
42  } else {
43  throw new ThemesException ( 'Template engine must be an instance of Twig for themes activation!' );
44  }
45  }
46 
47  public static function saveActiveTheme($theme) {
48  $config = Startup::getConfig ();
49  $config ['templateEngineOptions'] ['activeTheme'] = $theme;
50  $content = "<?php\nreturn " . UArray::asPhpArray ( $config, "array", 1, true ) . ";";
51  Startup::saveConfig ( $content );
52  return $config;
53  }
54 
60  public static function setActiveThemeFromTwig($activeTheme) {
61  self::$activeTheme = $activeTheme;
62  }
63 
69  public static function getAvailableThemes() {
70  $path = \ROOT . \DS . 'views' . \DS . self::THEMES_FOLDER . \DS . '*';
71  $dirs = \glob ( $path, GLOB_ONLYDIR | GLOB_NOSORT );
72  $result = [ ];
73  foreach ( $dirs as $dir ) {
74  $result [] = basename ( $dir );
75  }
76  return $result;
77  }
78 
84  public static function getRefThemes() {
85  return self::$refThemes;
86  }
87 
94  public static function isCustom($theme) {
95  return array_search ( $theme, self::$refThemes ) === false;
96  }
97 
103  public static function getNotInstalledThemes() {
104  $AvailableThemes = self::getAvailableThemes ();
105  return array_diff ( self::$refThemes, $AvailableThemes );
106  }
107 
114  public static function onBeforeRender($callback) {
115  EventsManager::addListener ( ViewEvents::BEFORE_RENDER, $callback );
116  }
117 
124  public static function onAfterRender($callback) {
125  EventsManager::addListener ( ViewEvents::AFTER_RENDER, $callback );
126  }
127 }
